session.goal: Fix Dev Intelligence Dashboard — GitHub API auth, base64 decoding, file paths, resilient fetching, flexible milestone parser

changes.summary: Fixed 5 bugs preventing the Dev Intelligence Dashboard from fetching live data: swapped non-working fine-grained PAT for gh CLI OAuth token, fixed base64 newline decoding, corrected docs/ file paths, switched to Promise.allSettled for partial failure resilience, and built flexible milestone parser supporting both table and heading+checklist formats.
files_modified: src/services/github-projects.ts (FIX — base64 newline strip, docs/ paths, Promise.allSettled, flexible milestone parser)
src/components/v2/DevProjectCard.tsx (FIX — property name mismatches: lastCommit→latestCommit, pullRequests→openPRs, milestone.id→milestone.phase, removed unused onRefresh)
.env (MOD — swapped fine-grained PAT for gh CLI OAuth token)
decisions_made: Used gh CLI OAuth token (gho_*) instead of fine-grained PAT — fine-grained PATs need explicit repo permissions
Promise.allSettled instead of Promise.all — partial data still shows when some endpoints fail
Flexible milestone parser handles both table format (daily-progress-tracker, maple-docs) and heading+checklist format (titan-trinity-core, maple-underwriter)
GitHub base64 content contains embedded newlines — strip before atob()
Governance docs live in docs/ subfolder, not repo root
